title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Dress Shirt Slim Fit Non Iron Solid
description: NON-IRON FABRIC: Resists wrinkles to keep you looking crisp all day; easy care, no ironing necessary
SLIM FIT: Modern fit with a tapered body and slimmer sleeves for a sleek look that flatters most body shapes

SPREAD COLLAR: Modern traditional collar with the tips pointed outwards, allowing for tie knots of all sizes; can be worn with or without neckwear; Adjustable Cuff: Two button positions allow for a more customized, improved fit; No Pocket: Sleek, streamlined design offers a cleaner appearance
